channel.title: Academic activities on Chen Tianhao
channel.description: Recent content in Academic activities on Chen Tianhao

item.title: Academic Salon and Media Interviews
item.description: Interviewed by Caixin over the ethics in science and technology, October, 2023 Tianhao Chen states that Measures for Scientific and Technological Ethics Review (for Trial Implementation) has set up the organization and procedure for the review of scientific and technological ethics. He holds the view that the incentive logic of the institutions and the operational logic of the scientific and technological ethics (review) committees are contradictory, “one is the accelerator, and the other is the brake.

item.title: Hydra
item.description: Motto Cut off one head and two will take their place

item.title: International Conferences with My Team
item.description: 17th Annual Conference of the European China Law Studies Association, September, 2023 Position：Helsinki, Netherlands Panel：New Public Interest Law Title：Judicializing Public Interests: Administrative Performance Under the Shadow of Judicial Review Author：Tianhao Chen, Yu Sheng, Wei Xu and Xiaohong Yu (Tsinghua University) 19th International Symposium on Global Manufacturing and China, September, 2023 Hangzhou, China Panel：IP Rights and Innovation Capability Title：Perceived Legal Environment of Intellectual Property and Firm Innovation: The Moderating Role of Legal mobilization Author：Tianhao Chen, Yipo Su, Yuhan Liu, Yuan Zhou Result：Best Paper Awards 83rd Academy of Management Meeting , August, 2023 Position：Boston, USA Panel：Innovation and Intellectual Property Title：Legal Environment of Intellectual Property and Innovation: The Moderating Role of Legal Mobilization Author：Tianhao Chen, Yipo Su, Yuhan Liu, Yuan Zhou

item.title: Tatooine
item.description: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…. A project was planned, but never completed
